sentences.sCn: 他被临时调到中央情报局工作去了。

sentences.sContent: They brainwashed the captured pilot into believing he was a CIA agent.
sentences.sContent_eng: They brainwashed the captured pilot into believing he was a CIA agent.
sentences.sCn: 他们迫使那个被俘的飞行员相信他是个中央情报局特务。

sentences.sContent: "There’s nothing I can tell you about how [this or] any other incidents were or are handled, " CIA historian David Robarge said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "There’s nothing I can tell you about how [this or] any other incidents were or are handled, " CIA historian David Robarge said.
sentences.sCn: “关于[这一或]或任何其他事故是如何处理的，我没有什么可以告诉你的，”中央情报局历史学家大卫·罗巴尔说。

trans.tranOther: The CIA is the government organization in the United States that collects secret information about other countries
